title: Sea power
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of the Navy and Vincent Donovan
brief_description: The aircraft carrier HMAS Melbourne and the Oberon class submarine HMAS Otway take part in an exercise off the eastern coast of Australia. Also seen are the destroyer HMAS Hobart, the supply ship HMAS Stalwart, minesweepers, Navy oil tankers, patrol boats, and some of the Navy’s aircraft.
